area: the town of jerico is a peacful farming, non religous, town that believes in kindness and second chances. the style of the town is very anceient aisa with one story buildings made of stone and wood.

room: a busy street full of venders and towns people going about their buisness, pags shop is around the corner
characters: welcome to the town of jerico, here you will find lots boring things to do and people to talk to. but this shop over here is quite intresting. and the old man who works here is also quite intresting if you let him.
items: a key which holds many fond memories of opening this shop
structures: a doorway to the magical place of discounted items
events: thanks for opening my shop, shall we go inside
pags shop has opened for the day

room: a small oak wood log cabin style shop that smells of honey
